title: Architect Life: A House Design Simulator
description:
Create dream homes! From 3D plan modelling through to on-site decision-making, you must bring each project to life while giving free rein to your creativity, to take your architectural firm to the pinnacle of the profession.
In Career mode, you set up your own architectural firm and take on the responsibility of managing a huge variety of contemporary home building projects from start to finish, through a series of key stages:
Once the construction phase is complete, explore your home with the first-person view! Change the position of the sun to admire the roomsâ€™ performance in different lights, and admire your creations in sublime rustic, urban or mountain landscapes.
Make the most of your vast creative freedom with a wide variety of materials, structures and items, and above all innovative construction tools which enable you to design your buildings with precision, from the shape of each room to detailed roof drawings. Crime Simulator
